Packages
echo  
org.apache.twill.api Classes in this package provides core functionality of the Twill library.
org.apache.twill.api.logging This package contains class for handling logging events.

org.apache.twill.discovery Classes in this package provides service discovery implementations.

org.apache.twill.ext  
org.apache.twill.filesystem Contains HDFS location classes.
org.apache.twill.kafka.client This package provides Kafka client interfaces.
org.apache.twill.launcher  
org.apache.twill.yarn Classes in this package implement the Twill API for Apache Hadoop YARN.
org.apache.twill.zookeeper This package provides functionality for ZooKeeper interactions.
